traitstrap

The goal of traitstrap is to select traits in hierarchical sampling designs. For more details on the methods see Maitner et al. (2021).

Installation

You can install traitstrap from GitHub with:

# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("Plant-Functional-Trait-Course/traitstrap")
